Recommendations: The faculty members are encouraged to produce scholarly works and research outputs which may be utilized for instructional development and improvement of instruction.

As part of the professional growth of faculty members, production and publication of instructional materials readily available for use in teaching may be taken into consideration. These must be submitted to the IM Committee for approval before utilization.
Research outputs and scholarly articles may be peer - reviewed and submitted for publication to CHED- recognized journals or in international refereed journals.
It is encouraged that faculty shall pursue graduate degree program aligned in their field of specialization.

Faculty members may encourage to find more ways to provide certification/ national certificate in their field of expertise. These activities could help develop faculty professional standards and competence.
